name: What To Do About Mother
description:
It's Friday night. Meni, his sister Keren, and their mother, are getting ready to sit down for a Shabbat dinner, when Mother has some important news to discuss with the kids.

What To Do About Mother is a short interactive story about a young man, Meni, who has to face the responsibilities of being part of a family.

The game was developed as part of a course in Non-Linear Storytelling, during our work towards a Master's Degree in Game Design and Shenkar College of Engineering and Design.
